After 48 hours on the road, and in the air,  Barcelona presents itself worthy with all things traditional at Gent del Barri. Starting with a refreshing Cava sangria,  with lots of fresh fruit and a sparkling crisp finish followed by the cerde plate. Flavorful thin strips of pork loin with crispy potatoes  (french fries), salad,  grilled tomatoes,  peppers and eggplant. Service was fast and prices were very good.
